Class GridEdge

java.lang.Object
at.tuwien.vis2.metromaps.model.grid.GridEdge
public class GridEdge extends Object
This class reprents an edge on the grid graph

      Parameters:
      source - GridVertex source
      destination - GridVertex destination
      bendCost -

  • Method Details

    • isClosedForLine

      public boolean isClosedForLine(String lineName)
      checks if an edge is closed for this particular line
      Parameters:
      lineName -
      Returns:
      true is the line is closed, false otherwise

    • getSource

      public GridVertex getSource()
      Returns:
      adjacent grid vertex

    • getDestination

      public GridVertex getDestination()
      Returns:
      adjacent grid vertex

    • getBendCost

      public GridEdge.BendCost getBendCost()

    • updateCosts

      public void updateCosts(double offsetCosts)
      Changes the offset costs and recalculates the total cost. Note: Already infinite costs stay infinite.
      Parameters:
      offsetCosts - costs depending on how far the grid edge is away from the original station where the path is routed.

    • setTaken

      public void setTaken(List<InputLine> lines, String lineName)
      marks the edge taken for a specific lines. This method is used if a path has been routed through this edge.
      Parameters:
      lines - all lines of an input edge. They are added to the gridEdge and marked as "not taken"
      lineName - line name of the routed edge. This line is marked as taken in the gridEdge

    • setCostsInf

      public void setCostsInf()
      Sets the total costs of a grid edge to inf, which means it is considered to be closed.

    • resetCosts

      public void resetCosts()
      Sets the offset costs to 1 and bend costs to 180 (0)

    • updateCosts

      public void updateCosts(GridEdge.BendCost newBendCost)
      Updates bend costs and adds them to the total costs. Not that already closed edges will still have costs inf.
      Parameters:
      newBendCost - freshly calculated bend costs to update

    • getCosts

      public double getCosts()
      total costs of a grid edge.
      Returns:
      1 if neither bendcost nor offset cost have been calculated. total costs otherwise.

    • reverse

      public void reverse()
      swaps source and destination of a grid edge

    • getColors

      public List<String> getColors()
      used for serializing.
      Returns:
      list of colors if the edge has a routed path, null otherwise.

    • setColors

      public void setColors(List<String> colors)
      if a path is routed with a color or a set of colors from an input line, these colors are added to a list, such that the frontend can display them.
      Parameters:
      colors - list of colors from a freshly routed path.
